citations.narrative:
Underneath some of the indoor runs (areas the animals cannot contact) old shavings material has built-up around stored
items. The stored items would make it difficult to routinely clean out the shavings to prevent the build-up. Animal areas
inside of the facility must be kept neat and free of clutter to aid in routine cleaning of the facility.
Ensure to not store items in this area and to aid in cleaning out the old shavings under the runs.
****Correct by July 25, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.1(b) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
Underneath some of the indoor runs (areas the animals cannot contact) old shavings material has built-up around stored 
items. The stored items would make it difficult to routinely clean out the shavings to prevent the build-up. Animal areas 
inside of the facility must be kept neat and free of clutter to aid in routine cleaning of the facility.  
Ensure to not store items in this area and to aid in cleaning out the old shavings under the runs. 
****Correct by July 25, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
